body:
Sorry for the giant pull request.  In order to update, I had to import to Android Studio.  That's the first commit.  

The second commit adds a new ShareFileProvider class and necessary entries in AndroidManifest.xml (with a resource, provider_paths.xml).  I then switched from using the raw Uri in ViewImageActivity to a content Uri using the FileProvider.  This prevents the FileUriExposedException thrown in API 24 or later.

body:
Brian,

The current exported HTML sets the background to black but doesn't set the font to white which leads completely black HTML file.

Here's a given HTML file output:
<html><head></title>Ascii Picture 2013-09-21-11-54-34</title></head><body><div style="background: black; letter-spacing: 3px;">

However simply adding the color and setting it to white fixes the html:

<html><head></title>Ascii Picture 2013-09-21-11-54-34</title></head><body><div style="background: black; letter-spacing: 3px; color: white">

Might be useful for some folks.

Also, can I file a request for enhancement? Would really love if there was a way to rotate the image while exporting a HTML.
